KnowledgeBase.Title: isBitVector
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isType isIntegerVector isFloatVector isNumberVector isByteVector isIdentical isObjectVector isPcodeVector isVector

Function.Description: The isBitVector function returns true if the argument is a Bit Vector; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isBitVector function returns true if the argument {obj} is a Bit Vector; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isBitVector function is a Boolean function that determines if an object is a Bit Vector.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes:
Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector,
FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory,
Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex, Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is a Bit Vector, otherwise false is returned.
